fields_extracted.imaging_findings: Random distribution of pure ground-glass opacities, sometimes mixed or solid, with clear boundaries, diameter <5mm. Can present as diffuse thin-walled cavities. Located near pleura.

fields_extracted.histopathology: Meningothelial-like cells arranged in nests or whorls with minimal stroma. Cells have indistinct borders, medium size, round/oval nuclei without atypia or mitoses. Sometimes nuclear inclusions present. Growth pattern along alveolar septa.
fields_extracted.histopathology_quote: 常可见类似脑膜上皮的细胞，呈巢状或旋涡状排列，间质成分少，高倍镜下常细胞边界不清，中等大小，核圆形或卵圆形，无异型性及核分裂象，有时可见核内包涵体
fields_extracted.immunohistochemistry: Positive for EMA, Vimentin, PR, CD56, SSTR2a. Negative for TTF-1, CK, Syn, S-100, AR, HMB-45.

fields_extracted.outcome_quote: MPMNs一般被认为是较为罕见，单发或多发，生长缓慢的肺部良性结节
fields_extracted.comorbidities: Lung adenocarcinoma, atypical adenomatous hyperplasia (AAH), thromboembolic disease
fields_extracted.comorbidities_quote: 在9.4%（92/976）的肺腺癌患者和12.0%（25/208）的非典型腺瘤样增生（atypical adenomatous hyperplasia, AAH）患者中发现了MPMNs...除肿瘤外，通过早期尸检研究和外科肺活检，MPMNs与血栓栓塞性疾病的关联也已被注意到
